category: Korea University Sports Committee Regulations/Article 1 (Establishment Basis and Name)
contents: Article 1 (Basis for establishment and name) It is established and operated in accordance with Article 41, Paragraph 1 of the Articles of Incorporation of the Korea Sports Council, and its name is the Korea University Sports Board, and in English it is called the Korean University Sports Board (abbreviated name: KUSB). Revised 2017. 4. 3.
